item.title: ‘I’m desperately trying to do right by everyone’: I’m giving my son $250K and my daughter 50% of a rental we co-own. Is that fair?
item.description: “I am currently saving this money for him.”

item.title: ‘I love my work’: I’m a 61-year-old Chicago public-school teacher with a $60K annual pension. Is it safe?
item.description: “I am aware that my pension as a Chicago public school teacher is dependent on factors that are very much in flux right now.”

item.title: ‘Where are we vulnerable?’ My husband and I are in our 50s. Our $450K mortgage is paid off. We have $500K in IRAs.
item.description: “We will not be downsizing our home, but we do have rental income of about $1,500 per month.”

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
